summary: I HAVE A 1995 FORD F-250 4X4 TRUCK.  THE STEERING SHAFT COMING OUT OF THE STEERING BOX HAS BROKEN IN HALF TWICE.  ONCE ON 12/24/01 AND ONCE AGAIN ON 2/02.  IN BOTH CASES, I LOST COMPLETE CONTROL OF STEERING.  FORD TELLS ME THAT THERE IS NO RECALL AND I AM THE ONLY CASE THAT THEY KNOW OF IN WHICH THIS HAS HAPPENED (LET ALONE TWICE).  YET I HAVE AN AQUANTENCE FOR WHOM THIS HAS ALSO HAPPENED.
